message: Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mPaint' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.

Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mBitmapPaint' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Each variable declaration must be in its own statement.
